userreviews.userReview: Wonderful seriesBree Nichols and her search and rescue dog, Sampson take us on quite a journey. From searching for her own son, Davey, who is lost due to a plane crash that took the life of her husband, Rob to finding true love with Park Ranger Kade Matthews. Colleen Coble has put together a series of whodunits that keep you coming back for more. I couldn't get enough!

A nice collection of romantic suspense novelsA nice collection of romantic suspense novels. They are solid mysteries without all the long descriptive sex scenes so many books have these days. You’ll find the characters interesting and the plots complex.
Wow these were great!I really loved these books,my he characters were so like able and human. The stories flowed so well and I learned so much about search dog rescue!

I have read all 5 of the Rock Harbor series. I love them all. I love Bree and Samson. It makes me want to have a rescue dog. You can read the author's words and descriptions of the area in the Upper Pennisula and you feel as cold as they are in the snow. I love the author for that fact. You feel like you are really there. The story lines are good in that you never know what is going to happen next. There is always an interesting turn in the story.I love Samson and hearing her talk about the rescue dogs and how they work. It is a series well worth reading. I have just started the Aloha Reef series. Can't wait to see what is in store in Hawaii.

Nice seriesThis was a good series. Although they were understandable as individual stand alone books. There were a variety of subjects in addition to the search and rescue, to keep it interesting--animal conservation, Finnish culture, autism--to name a few. Parts were predictable, and parts were ridiculous (spoiler)...undiagnosed twins, but Bree deserved her happy ending, right!?
Hated to put it down. Read them all in three days. Wonderful collection. Loved the characters...wish Samson was mine! Not to be missed. Its a series that I just wish had one more story
Couldn't put it downLove the book. I purchased it for my kindle several weeks ago and never was able to find time to read. If only I had know what I was missing. Fell in love with Rock Harbour!

Upper Penninsula NovelsI heard about these stories from my friend, who suggested I read them. Once I started I couldn't stop, I read them back to back. Riveting storylines with an unexpected turnout each time. I can't wait to start the next one.Very well written.
This was an amazing series! I've always been fascinated with Search and Rescue dogs. Every book was interesting and I enjoyed the continuing stories. The last book surprised me though.
Great seriesI loved everything about these books. I feel like a part of Rock Harbor. I hope there are more in this series to read. Great author!
Great seriesGreat series. Would definitely recommend it to anyone that loves to read. I couldn't wait to get to the next book.
5 books in 1. took me awhile to read, but loved each and every store.

description: USA Today" best-selling author Colleen Coble's Rock Harbor series now available in one volume!Without a TraceBree thinks a plane crash took the lives of her husband and young son, but her son Davy survived the accident. Can she find him before it's too late?Beyond a DoubtEvidence of a violent crime in Bree's basement causes police to re-open a cold case. Can she and her K-9 search dog, Samson, stop the killer before he strikes again?Into the DeepWhen Bree's dog Samson goes missing, it's just the beginning of her life turning upside down.Cry in the NightBree and Samson discover a crying infant in the snowy Rock Harbor forest. But where are the baby's parents? And how did she get there?Silent NightAs Christmas day nears, Bree and her faithful search-and-rescue dog Samson follow the trail of a troubling mystery into the snowy forests of Rock Harbor.
title:
The Rock Harbor Collection: Without a Trace, Beyond a Doubt, Into the Deep, Cry in the Night, and Silent Night
      
          (Rock Harbor #1-5)
